body:
I want to set a Gravatar for my profile picture but it says:
"In order to use Gravatar as your profile picture, you must have a confirmed email."

How do I confirm it?
body_tagged:
I want to set a Gravatar for my profile picture but it says:
"In order to use Gravatar as your profile picture, you must have a confirmed email."

How do I confirm it?
title: How do I confirm my email?

replies.body: check your hotmail to see if theres a thing that tells you to click this to confirm your email
replies.body_tagged: check your hotmail to see if theres a thing that tells you to click this to confirm your email

reply_to.body: check your hotmail to see if theres a thing that tells you to click this to confirm your email
reply_to.body_tagged: check your hotmail to see if theres a thing that tells you to click this to confirm your email

replies.body: Try again Tyn. Or resend the conformation email. If not contact staff (idk if they can help you withthat though xD
replies.body_tagged: Try again Tyn. Or resend the conformation email. If not contact staff (idk if they can help you withthat though xD

replies.body: Confirmation E-Mails usually go into the spam folder automatically, might want to check there..
replies.body_tagged: Confirmation E-Mails usually go into the spam folder automatically, might want to check there..
